name: Corruption (itch) (Topper)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 40 (theme: the more you have, the worse it is).

Destabilise and corrupt the world, and test your computer’s performance while you’re at it. In a fairly literal interpretation of the theme, every time you collect an energy ball, the quality of the game itself degrades, by gradually filling up with static.

I'm not accountable for any crashes you may incur by going too far...
